com.theif519.sakoverlay.Core.Services

Class RecorderService.RecorderBinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • Binder
      • com.theif519.sakoverlay.Widgets.Services.RecorderService.RecorderBinder
  • Enclosing class:
    RecorderService

    public class RecorderService.RecorderBinder
extends Binder
    The IBinder returned when we are bound to an activity/fragment. It allows who we are bound to to maintain a handle to this instance (which in and of itself allows it to manipulate the current state) as well as an observable to be notified on any state changes.
